pageProduct.name: Schwarzkopf Got2b Modelling Wax 100ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

It's got to be got2b!
got2b modelling wax with natural shine has a wax-like structure and gel-like hold for reworkable styles. It provides extreme hold 5, pliability and is easy to wash out.

It's got to be got2b!
got2b modelling wax with natural shine has a wax-like structure and gel-like hold for reworkable styles. It provides extreme hold 5, pliability and is easy to wash out.

Rub a small amount between your fingertips or palms and work into dry or damp hair from roots to tips. Sculpt and accentuate individual strands.

From volume & shine to hold & spikes, got2b offers the right styling products for your individual look. It's all about expressing your style - show off your personality, individuality & attitude with got2b brand! No matter what look you're going for, you can get it with got2b products. You got2b you!

Made in Australia.

Jar & Lid can be placed in kerbside recycling bin. Jar & Lid can also be recycled via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for details. Push Your Styling to New Heights

Suitable For: all hair types

Size: 100mL

Hair Type: all hair types

KEY FEATURES

• For reworkable styles
• Natural shine
• Extreme hold 5
• Easy to wash out
• You got2b you!

Warnings

No

Ingredients

Water, Cera Alba (Beeswax), Petrolatum, PVP, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Stearic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Cetyl Alcohol, Parfum, Steareth-21, Steareth-2, Paraffinum Liquidum (Mineral Oil), PPG-5-Ceteth-20, Oleth-20, VP/DMAPA Acrylates Copolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Benzyl Alcohol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Aminomethyl Propanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Dicetyl Phosphate, Ceteth-10 Phosphate, Ethylhexylglycerin, C12-15 Alcohols, Linalool, Caffeine, Panthenol, Limonene, Benzalkonium Chloride, Eugenol, Citral

Active Ingredients: Water, Cera Alba (Beeswax), Petrolatum, PVP, C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Stearic Acid, Palmitic Acid, Cetyl Alcohol, Parfum, Steareth-21, Steareth-2, Paraffinum Liquidum (Mineral Oil), PPG-5-Ceteth-20, Oleth-20, VP/DMAPA Acrylates Copolymer, Phenoxyethanol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Benzyl Alcohol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Aminomethyl Propanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Dicetyl Phosphate, Ceteth-10 Phosphate, Ethylhexylglycerin, C12-15 Alcohols, Linalool, Caffeine, Panthenol, Limonene, Benzalkonium Chloride, Eugenol, Citral

Directions

Rub a small amount between your fingertips or palms and work into dry or damp hair from roots to tips. Sculpt and accentuate individual strands.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Jar & Lid can be placed in kerbside recycling bin. Jar & Lid can also be recycled via TerraCycle. Visit TerraCycle.com for details.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
